item.title: Ferguson plc 10-K
item.description: Ferguson plc, which is in the Wholesale-Hardware & Plumbing & Heating Equipment & Supplies [5070] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 27, 2022 had 37698 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
